name: Road Switch - Color Road Run
description:
Move to the ball which has the same color!

Avoid the ball which has a different color.

How good is your hand-eye coordination?

Road switch is a fast-paced, challenging, and very addictive game. it tests how good is your hand-eye coordination.

How to play?

Tap to change direction. Your ball color must match the color pattern on each obstacle to cross it. Avoid hitting different colors.

Beat your highest score.

Download Road Switch and start the fun now!
Good luck!
